# sizeToFit()

**Instance Method**

This action method resizes the progress indicator to an appropriate size depending on the value of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSProgressIndicator/style-swift.property].

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func sizeToFit()
```

## Discussion

Use this after you use [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSProgressIndicator/style-swift.property] to re-size the progress indicator.

## Setting the appearance

- **controlSize**: The size of the progress indicator.
- **controlTint**: The progress indicator’s control tint.
- **isBezeled**: A Boolean that indicates whether the progress indicator’s frame has a three-dimensional bezel.
- **isIndeterminate**: A Boolean that indicates whether the progress indicator is indeterminate.
- **style**: The style of the progress indicator (bar or spinning).
- **isDisplayedWhenStopped**: A Boolean that indicates whether the progress indicator hides itself when it isn’t animating.
